description: Real-time GitHub Actions observability: DORA Metrics, Cost Analysis, CI/CD Health dashboards.

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.tsviz/actions-pulse

environmentVariables.description: GitHub Personal Access Token (fine-grained recommended) with read access to Actions, Administration, Deployments, Issues, Pull Requests
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Enterprise slug for enhanced cross-org features (optional)
environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_ENTERPRISE_SLUG

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of repository names to monitor (e.g., 'my-app,my-api,frontend'). If not set, all org repos are queried.
environmentVariables.name: DEFAULT_REPO_FILTER

title: ActionsPulse
